text: Watching the media go to war with Facebook is depressing. The most constructive way to attack Facebook is to compete with Facebook. Create lots of places people can go to get the news from lots of sources, experiment, find better ways. They are there. It's too early to lock this down. But everyone is greedy and lazy, they want the money that Facebook is making without having to create a product that people want. Facebook has done that. Learn from them, and make a better product. It's still not too late, but you have to start heading in the right direction.
